title: Attacks Brings New Attention to U.K. Preparedness (Audio)
itunes:title: Attacks Brings New Attention to U.K. Preparedness (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Julia Ebner, senior researcher at Quilliam, discusses anti-terror policies in the wake of the attacks in Westminster earlier this week. She speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
